name: AWSPowerShellModuleScript
friendlyName: AWS Tools for Windows PowerShell Script
description: Run a PowerShell script that uses the AWS Tools for Windows PowerShell
author: Amazon Web Services
helpMarkDown: Run a PowerShell script that uses cmdlets from the [AWS Tools for Windows PowerShell (AWSPowerShell)](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/AWSPowerShell) module.
instanceNameFormat: AWS Tools for Windows PowerShell Script: $(scriptFile)

inputs.name: awsCredentials
inputs.label: AWS Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AWS credentials to use. If needed, click on 'Manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'AWS'

inputs.name: scriptType
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of the script: File Path or Inline Script

inputs.name: scriptName
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the script to execute. Should be fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory.

inputs.name: inlineScript
inputs.label: Inline Script
inputs.defaultValue:
# You can write your powershell scripts inline here. 
# You can also pass predefined and custom variables to this scripts using arguments

# The AWSPowerShell module will be imported for you.

 Write-Host "Hello World"

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments passed to the script.  Either ordinal parameters or named parameters

inputs.name: autoInstallModule
inputs.label: Automatically install the tools [Microsoft Windows build agents only]
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Automatically installs the AWS Tools for Windows PowerShell module from the [PowerShell Gallery](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/AWSPowerShell/) before running the specified script. If unchecked and the module is not installed an error is thrown.

This option only applies to agents running on Microsoft Windows.

messages.VerifyingAWSPowerShellModuleInstalled: Verifying that the AWSPowerShell module is installed
messages.AWSPowerShellModuleNotFound: The AWSPowerShell module is not installed on this machine and auto-install option not selected
messages.IncompatiblePowerShellEditionFound: Current PowerShell edition is not 'Desktop', required for the AWSPowerShell module. Abandoning automatic installation.
messages.CompatiblePowerShellEditionFound: Current PowerShell edition is 'Desktop' and is compatible with the AWSPowerShell module
messages.ErrorCheckingModuleInstall: An error occurred while testing for module installation.
